security: The message is short, but reveals operational codenames (AMLONG) and a query related to identity, which could compromise intelligence sources and methods if exposed. Quoting: 'IDENTITY A ALFREDO DAVINS'
summary: A highly redacted CIA message from Director to Mexico City station concerning project 'AMLONG' and an individual named Alfredo Davins.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET-level classified message, dated October 5, 1963, originates from the Director of the CIA and is addressed to the Mexico City station. The message refers to project 'AMLONG' and includes a query about the identity of an individual named Alfredo Davins.
title: Message regarding AMLONG and Alfredo Davins
